```{r}
install.packages("smoothmest")
library(smoothmest)
```



```{r}
n=numeric()
y<-numeric()
u<-(2*exp(1)/pi)^(1/2)
for (i in 1:1000) {
  
x <- rdoublex(1,mu=0,lambda=1)
f_0_x<-ddoublex(x)
f_x<-dnorm(x)
pi_x<-f_x/(f_0_x*u)

uni<-runif(1,0,1)
tmp <- 1
while( uni>pi_x){
x <- rdoublex(1,mu=0,lambda=1)
f_0_x<-ddoublex(x)
f_x<-dnorm(x)
pi_x<-f_x/(f_0_x*u)
uni<-runif(1,0,1)
tmp <- 1+tmp
}
y[i] <- x  
n[i] <- tmp
}

hist(y)
(num_of_runs <- sum(n))
qqnorm(Y)
qqline(Y)
```
